meanings.definition: Resistant to damage from impact or vibration.
meanings.sent1: The shockproof case protected my phone from breaking when it fell.
meanings.sent2: The shockproof camera survived the fall without any scratches.
meanings.sent3: The shockproof laptop bag saved the computer from harm during the bumpy ride.
meanings.sent4: Her shockproof watch seemed invincible against the rough handling.
meanings.sent5: The shockproof glass was like a shield against any force trying to break it.

meanings.definition: Designed to withstand sudden jolts or impacts.
meanings.sent1: The shockproof helmet kept the cyclist safe during the accident.
meanings.sent2: The shockproof suitcase endured the rough handling at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The shockproof phone cover was like a superhero cape for the device.
meanings.sent4: His shockproof vest made him feel like a fearless warrior.
meanings.sent5: The shockproof car bumper absorbed the impact of the collision effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Capable of absorbing or dampening the effects of a shock.
meanings.sent1: The shockproof material cushioned the fragile items inside the box.
meanings.sent2: The shockproof gloves reduced the impact of the punch.
meanings.sent3: The shockproof mattress felt like sleeping on a cloud after a long day.
meanings.sent4: Her shockproof shoes lessened the pain of walking on hard surfaces.
meanings.sent5: The shockproof padding on the walls made the room feel cozy and secure.
